summary: Build a website that provides number info and vehicle registration info lookups using the provided APIs, with desktop mode and a dark theme UI.
architectural_notes: Integrate with two external lookup APIs: numinfo endpoint (query param num) and vehicle info endpoint (query param reg).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Dark terminal-style background with subtle grid/noise and green accent glow (hacker-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Minimal cyber/terminal-inspired app icon mark, monochrome green on transparent background (hacker-mark.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page website UI with two lookup tools: (1) Number Info lookup and (2) Vehicle Registration Info lookup.
Implement the Number Info lookup by calling the provided API endpoint using the user-entered number appended to the `num=` query parameter: https://usesirosint.vercel.app/api/numinfo?key=salaarz&num=

Implement the Vehicle Registration Info lookup by calling the provided API endpoint using the user-entered registration appended to the `reg=` query parameter: https://vehicle-number-info.snipy-owner.workers.dev/?reg=
Add a responsive, desktop-friendly layout (“desktop mode”) that makes good use of large screens while remaining usable on mobile.
Apply a consistent dark “hacker” theme across the UI (dark background, high-contrast text, terminal-inspired accents), with all user-facing text in English.
Use React Query for lookup requests and cache results per query input to avoid unnecessary re-fetching when repeating the same lookup.
Add the required generated static images to the project and render them in the UI as part of the hacker-themed design (served from frontend/public/assets/generated).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a website UI for number info lookup using https://usesirosint.vercel.app/api/numinfo?key=salaarz&num=
Create a website UI for vehicle registration info lookup using https://vehicle-number-info.snipy-owner.workers.dev/?reg=
